metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37052 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
A reachable Object::getString assertion in Poppler 22.07.0 allows attackersto cause a denial of service due to a failure in markObject.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37052` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
libpoppler-glib8 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
libpoppler118 - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
poppler-utils - 22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '22.02.0-2ubuntu0.3').
